Package presentation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddMainCategoryCommand  
    AddMinorCategoryCommand  
    AddProductCommand
    Once the user has entered the necesarry informations for adding a product we grab the attributes and add the product to the database.
    BulkEditProductsCommand  
    Command  
    DeleteMainCategoryCommand  
    DeleteMinorCategoryCommand  
    DeleteProductCommand
    * Once the user has entered the ID of the product he/she wants to delete, we grab the attribute and delete the product from the database.
    DownloadExcelFile
    Takes an ExcelWriter that takes all of the products in DB via "excelwriter.DataBaseToExcel("/db.properties");" once that is done we save the file as a temp in the property file path.
    DownloadJsonFile
    Takes an JsonWriter that takes all of the products in DB via "jsonwriter.DataBaseToJson("/db.properties");" once that is done we save the file as a temp in the property file path.
    EditMainCategoryCommand  
    EditMinorCategoryCommand  
    EditProductCommand
    Once the .jsp page has found a product and the necessary changes has been made we grab the attributes and do an update on the product.
    EditProductSearchCommand
    When we are at the EditProduct.jsp we have to enter a product id.
    FrontController  
    SearchProductCommand
    When we search for a product we have a drowndown list.
    UnknownCommand
    Used to show a #404 page when someone tries to modify the "cmd=" on the http.
    UploadFiles
    Used for uploading an .xlsx or .json document.
    UploadImage
    Used for uploading an .JPG pictures.
